title: 820-00165 no video???
message:
This was a donated macbook. Installed a SSD, loaded OSX and while charging the battery up the screen just randomly went out. Tried a good known test screen as well but still no image or backlight. Chimes and has USB activity.  0V on EDP_Panel_PWR

Board has no liquid damage. What to check next?

title: 820-00165 no video???
message:
Check for corrosion near LCD connector.

Do you get 3V at pins 18/19, at least in the first seconds (when chime)?
DP_INT_HPD should go to 2.65V at same time; if LCD connected.

title: 820-00165 no video???
message:
Yes no corrosion near LCD connector,

0v at pins 18/19 even at first few seconds when chime

DP_INT_HPD remains at 0V

title: 820-00165 no video???
message:
"0v at pins 18/19"
Check diode mode to ground, w/ LCD connected.

Test for voltage there w/o LCD connected.
At least few seconds must appear.
Keep voltmeter connected, pulg in the charger and monitor voltage 10s in that point.

title: 820-00165 no video???
message:
0.460 diode mode w/ LCD

Voltage remains at 0 with meter connected from time charger is plugged in. Also measured at L8304

title: 820-00165 no video???
message: Check if EDP_PANEL_PWR tries to come on at least.

title: 820-00165 no video???
message:
EDP_PANEL_PWR  also 0V

 R1431 67K

Could this be bad CPU even though it chimes with usb activity???

title: 820-00165 no video???
message:
Looks like...

PCH should enable 3V for LCD first.
If LCD replies with correct DP_INT_HPD, voltage is maintained and eDP output enabled too.

title: 820-00165 no video???
message: Anything else I could check at this point or is this hopeless?

title: 820-00165 no video???
message: Heat PCH area with quality flux.

title: 820-00165 no video???
message:
found a small spec of corrosion on pad 2 of C8160. Scrapped it away and now board does not come on at all. No green light. PPBUS_G3H only 8.20V

Should SMC be replaced even though no liquid damage in that area???

title: 820-00165 no video???
message: Do you get SMC_RESET_L at least?

title: 820-00165 no video???
message: Bad IO cable was causing it not to turn on. Still 0v on DP_INT_HPD. Will heat PCH with quality flux and try ultrasonic. Afterwards is there anything else to check or hopeless?
